Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity. I believe you would greatly benefit from our premium product, tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $12000 for this exceptional item. This offer not only ensures you receive the highest quality product but also secures a significant savings compared to its full value of $10000 to you. I look forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
